// === CHECKPOINT FLAG ===
// Object: CheckpointFlag (Sprite). On touch, set global checkpoint and play a simple 'capture' anim.

On collision Player with CheckpointFlag
→ Set CheckpointX = CheckpointFlag.X
→ Set CheckpointY = CheckpointFlag.Y
→ CheckpointFlag: Set animation frame 1 (optional 'captured' frame)
→ (Optional) Audio: play chime

On collision Player2 with CheckpointFlag
→ Set CheckpointX = CheckpointFlag.X
→ Set CheckpointY = CheckpointFlag.Y
→ CheckpointFlag: Set animation frame 1
